title: The best way to make vayne a fair pick
body: make it so that she actually has low range compared to every other adc. her role is as the premier tankbuster right? tanks don't have so much range in their kit generally, except for skillshots, and vayne already has the capacity to peel off any tank even if caught so long as she is in a 1v1 situation, so why don't we nerf vayne's capacity to equally trade against other laners on the bottom lane in exchange for her ridiculous tank destroying prowess. you could even use this as just a bandaid, incase you think that vayne would need more than this to be balanced.

replies.body: I wouldnt mind because then she would only be good in top lane so no one would play her like quinn
hey man, that top lane adc thing might come into the meta hard with them pushing some fighters on bottom lane. it might even be really good with mordekaiser.
She is fine. if you lose against her in lane then you need alot more practice.

it's not losing against her, it's actually beating her that's hard. not saying she needs to be absolute trash in lane, but vayne really should be a reflexive pick, not a pick you make because she is reliable.
